menu_management.title: Manage Your Digital Menu
menu_management.subtitle: Edit your menu content, customize its design, and share it with your customers.
menu_management.active_description: Your menu is visible to your customers.
menu_management.draft_description: Your menu is not yet published, only you can see it.

edit_content.title: Edit Menu Content
edit_content.description: You can edit your categories, products, descriptions, prices, and images from here.

customize_design.title: Customize Menu Design
customize_design.description: You can change your menu's logo, text color, background color, and accent color from here.

view_share.title: View and Share Menu
view_share.description: Share your menu with your customers via QR code and link.

menu_management.copy_error: Failed to copy link. Please copy manually.
menu_management.status_update_error: An error occurred while updating menu status.
menu_management.no_restaurant_error: Restaurant information not found. Please refresh the page.

auth.logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
